review.reviewText: Clean. Friendly staff. Allowed to check in early and check out late.

review.title: Close to the airport
review.reviewText: I picked this hotel because it was close to the airport. Nice comfortable accommodations.  Right down the street from the airport and close to restaurants.

review.title: Nice but noisy
review.reviewText: Nice facility, but along flight path meaning noisy.

review.title: Convenient to airport
review.reviewText: Needed to be close to long term parking to catch an early flight. Hotel is clean, comfortable.

review.title: Didn't realize the hotel didn't have a pool.
review.reviewText: Good hotel for one night stay.  Booked this location accidentally - didn't realize the sounds of the planes would be so loud.  My fault - as I said, I accidentally booked this location.

review.title: convenient to airport
review.reviewText: close to airport and what you would expect from Comfort Inn. Tired unit.
review.negativeRemarks: Facility is tired and needs updating.
review.locationRemarks: Little to do nearby, tough older neighborhood.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Sir,

We saw your review and my manager went and fixed the fridge in your room and pulled out the blackout curtains for you. We also put in conditioner for you. We do carry other extra items like toothbrush, razor, shaving cream and other bathroom necessities that are available upon request at the front desk. 

If there is anything else we can do for you please do not hesitate to let the front desk know.

review.title: Close to airport overcomes discomfort
review.reviewText:
Really close to airport. About 5 min drive to Airtrain Car rental station.
This is a nice hotel in a strange neighborhood, more residential than commercial.
Hotel staff are really helpful and friendly.
The fridge in my room not working. Two shampoos and no conditioner (sound familiar).
My room faces street and the window only has thin curtains. I did not want to turn on the light at the night.

review.title: Not so nice
review.reviewText: For the amount we paid, we would have hoped for a better room!! There was Pee on one of the beds, but besides that.. It was ok
review.locationRemarks: San Francisco Bay!!!

review.title: Very nice!!
review.reviewText: The staff was very nice and they were very helpful. Carlo went out of his way to get us long term parking for our car. They were very reasonable on their rate. I would diffenately stay at the hotel again.

review.title: relaxing weekend
review.reviewText: the front desk customer service personnel was very resourceful, polite and friendly.  the facilities were clean and remodeled tastefully.  the room was clean and comfortable.  the location was convenient.  i would highly recommend and i would stay again.
review.locationRemarks: located close to the airport, malls and restaurants

review.title: Ok
review.reviewText: Good for the price. Very close to the airport and the shuttle bus runs every 30 minutes or so,which was very convenient. Nothing amazing but nothing to complain, either. The front desk people were nice and very welcoming. The room was clean and the bed was really comfortable. I loved they had soft pillows and harder pillows.

review.title: Great hotel near SFO
review.reviewText: Free parking, nice rooms, great value at this hotel!
The remodeled room was great. The rest of the hotel will be done soon.  Great stay.
review.locationRemarks: Ideal location if you need to return a rental car or an early flight.

review.title: Close to airport, good deal for the cost
review.reviewText: We only needed a place to stay enroute back to Midwest from our trip to California. The motel was comfortable, close to the airport, clean and had all of the amenities, except they were remodeling and the fitness room was closed. Breakfast was not exceptional, but was free and had a pretty good variety. I would stay there again.

review.title: 1 Night stay. Close to the Airport.
review.reviewText:
We chose the Comfort Inn because of it's close location to the San Francisco Airport. We came off a cruise and wanted to stay 1 extra day to do a bit of touring. We arrived at Comfort Inn at approximately 9 a.m. and they stored our luggage for us and off we went touring. When We came back about 3 p.m. we checked in. They upgraded us from a King Bed Standard room to a King Bed Suite which was a pleasant surprise. Our 1 night stay was enjoyable. Everyone must remember when You stay at a Hotel near an Airport You will hear Airplanes occasionally. It did not bother us.
We got a free breakfast in the morning and free shuttle bus to the Airport.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean Room. Close to the Airport. Free Breakfast and Free Shuttle bus to the Airport.
review.locationRemarks: Close to Airport. A few restaurants about a 15 minute walk away. Convenience store with Beer and Liquor about a 5 minute walk away.

review.title: pleasant hotel
review.reviewText: close to the air port and down town and easy access to the fwy.

review.title: Good for the price
review.reviewText: It was cheap and good room to stay, very close to the airport and have a shuttle to take you there.

review.title: Great experience
review.reviewText: We were pleasantly surprised at the spaciousness of the room (two queens). It was more than enough room for all of us. Everything was clean and well maintained. And of course, the breakfast was wonderful. The full breakfast was why we chose Comfort Inn. We also liked that the stairs were well lit and seemed like they were a part of the hotel not just an emergency exit. We are a family that would much rather take the stairs rather than an elevator, so not having to go out of our way or in some dark, dirty back stairwell was very welcomed.
review.positiveRemarks: The full breakfast! Also the atrium - it made things bright and nice.
review.negativeRemarks: The desk clerk couldn't tell me how to get to the beach. Yes, it was December, but it was also 70 degrees and we wanted to walk on the beach!
review.locationRemarks: Every weekend between Thanksgiving and Christmas at the Cow Palace (less than 10 miles) is the Great Dickens Christmas Fair. That's why we were there!

review.title: Good Value for your money!
review.reviewText: The room is clean and comfortable. The staff are nice and friendly.
review.positiveRemarks: The jacuzzi in the bathroom was nice. the energy savings (light, heat, water) is great!
review.locationRemarks: About 6 blocks from The shops at Tansforan.

review.title: Easy bus ride to Fisherman's Wharf
review.reviewText: Hotel was very average but clean. Could see the Golden Gate from our room. Helpful staff and good location.

review.title: Close to SFO airport
review.reviewText: My husband and I wanted a hotel near san Francisco airport, so we could manage an early flight home the next morning. The Comfort Inn was incredibly convenient - only about a mile away from the car rental return. The Inn itself was clean; the parking great and the bed comfortable. We even had time for the self-serve breakfast in the morning (included in the stay) - and, as my husband said, 'they even have good scrambled eggs!' I recommend this inexpensive stay if you need a place near SFO for the night.
review.negativeRemarks: For the price, nothing - we'll use it again.
review.locationRemarks: Must admit the food selection nearby is limited.

review.title: Make sure you request Park n Fly Room!!
review.reviewText: The hotel was great, however, we thought we were booking a Park n Fly through Expedia. We found out you cannot book Park n Fly's through a third party. You need to call the hotel directly. The staff was very helpful trying to help us locate a parking lot for our car. Everywhere was full. We ended up finally just driving around the airport early the next morning and finally found one that could take our car for an additional $18.00 a night.
review.negativeRemarks: Expedia needs to state that they do not offer Park n Fly's.

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Arrived early and was aloud to check in with no fuss.
review.positiveRemarks: Away from the hussel and bussel of San Fran. Only 15 minute drive in. Breakfast was all we needed. Loved the waffle maker.
review.negativeRemarks: As this hotel is extremely close to the airport it can be very noisy with the planes going over.
review.locationRemarks: If you have a car there is laundry facilities not far and a shopping centre 5 min away.

review.title: Near Airport
review.reviewText: We only needed a place to lay our heads before our early morning flight and it was inexpensive so it suited us. The staff couldn't have been nicer and I would stay again.

review.title: Super-convenient airport hotel
review.reviewText: Perfect for what I wanted -- a convenient hotel, not too expensive, very close to the SF airport. They have a full breakfast, though no room service, but they're close to pizza places that deliver and a mini-mart that sells snacks & beverages. Staff was really helpful. Room was large and comfortable. You can hear the airplanes overhead, but I didn't mind.
review.positiveRemarks: Convenience, price (considering the price of other airport hotels), staff, size of room.

review.title: no amenities or food nearby
review.reviewText: Poor exterior, in a bad area and no food or amenities nearby, I wouldn't stay there again for the price I could have stayed at the Marriott where my conference was and it would have evened out since I had to pay cab fare to get to the hotel, find food which I had to pay the cab to take me to because there was nothing close to walk to, overall a very disappointing and depressing experience.
review.negativeRemarks: The pillows were crummy the bedspread had burns in it, the room had an odor, overall depressing room
review.locationRemarks: absolutely nothing nearby, couldn't walk to anything for food or things to do...

review.title: close to airport
review.reviewText: good location if you are renting a car- easy trip to car return. Staff are nice. Facility needs some updating, and traffic noise is present, but overall a good value.
review.positiveRemarks: very easy access to airport and rental car return building.
review.locationRemarks: close to shopping center and restaurants.

review.title: Good enough
review.reviewText: Need a hotel close to San Francisco with affordable price
review.positiveRemarks: Have all you need and good quaity
review.locationRemarks: Quite city

review.title: Near airport
review.reviewText: Overall alright, parking is limited and open. Room is a decent size, just the place is very small..

review.title: Great for an overnight stay.
review.reviewText: The staff was very pleasant and helpful. They assisted us with getting our airline boarding passes, and breakfast was really pretty good.

review.title: Not worth the money
review.reviewText: The staff seemed very nice and helpful, the breakfast was good and the free shuttle to the airport was great. I'm disappointed with the hotel rooms, the kitchen area was filthy. Wasn't worth the money. Rooms need improving.
review.locationRemarks: Great location for the San Fran airport

review.title: Comfort Inn (San Bruno) San Francisco Airport West
review.reviewText: Comfortable hotel located close to San Francisco airport and car rental locations, with shuttle bus service hourly.
review.locationRemarks: Close to airport and within walking distance of a number of San Bruno restaurants.

review.title: Great comfort near the airport
review.reviewText: Perfect convenient place near the airport, and a good proximity to the main street and its varied choice of restaurants and shops. Transport to the airport could be more than every hour but turned out to be very practical. Although breakfast is normally not served before 6am, with a few clients leaving one hour earlier for the airport, the effort was made to provide all the breakfast on time for the airport bus. A strong "recommend" and definitely a return destination.

review.title: for a night closer to airport prior to early fligh
review.reviewText: Good value for family - did its job for a night closer to airport prior to early flight at SFO. Cheap, clean and friendly. Shuttle to airport is quick but frequency a bit cumbersome

review.title: good nights sleep
review.reviewText: Nice location, rooms cimfortable, breakfast lacking
review.negativeRemarks: breakfast very limited. Not enough eggs or sausage
review.locationRemarks: Close to very good resturants

review.title: Great location near the airport
review.reviewText: Hotel is ideally located 5 minutos from the San Francisco airport. It has all you need nearby and San Francisco is easily reachable by bart.

review.title: disappointing stay......
review.reviewText: They charge me $7.60 out of the blue, everything was paid for. i do not understand this charge.
review.locationRemarks: lousy

review.title: Location, location, loacation!
review.reviewText: Very convenient location, close to San Franciso International airport. Well maintained, clean and comforable rooms. Shuttle service between hotel and airport available.
review.positiveRemarks: Quiet and close to the airport for an early morning departure.

review.title: Nice for the Price, a few issues
review.reviewText: This hotel being close to SFO I'm sure is a plus for some, but during the day the planes take-off in the direction of the hotel. It was so loud sometimes it sounded like they were going to come through the walls. During the night they take-off and land over the bay, so noise wasnt to bad at night. It wasn't a big deal since we were gone during the day. The hotel wasnt close to restaurants, entailed a little bit of a drive. The mall with everything was down the road about 4-5 miles, not really walking distance. The rooms were nice and clean, nice beds. The bathroom on the other hand was a little gross. While taking a shower I noticed mold. Little patches on the white caulk in between the grantie walls, it was a little dis-heartening. Very good access to the freeway next to 101 and I-280 or I-380 (cant remember which one). The purpose of the trip was to do the Peir 39 tourist thing and go to the Zoo with 2 boys and my wife. It took about 12-15 min to get to both locations, depending on traffic. Parking at the hotel could of been an issue if it was busy. There are only maybe 15 parking spots, so if you came in late at night you had to double park behind another vehicle, then give your keys to the front desk. I didnt really like that idea. So I guess for the price we paid it was fairly good, but with a few issues. We most likely wont stay here when we come back to the San Francisco area.
review.negativeRemarks: No restaurants near-by mold in shower
review.locationRemarks: A little sketchy.

review.title: don;t let location and reception area fool you ..
review.reviewText: surpringly high return for bargen price ..... great location for ease into citly and quick return for rental car and airport
review.negativeRemarks: buzz of airplane every once in a while
review.locationRemarks: convienient to everything

review.title: Shuttle bus to the airport could be more frequent
review.reviewText: The airport shuttle was not frequent enough. In the morning time there were only one time shuttle to the airport each hour. Last time I stayed at Comfort Inn airport north, which is far from the airport than that of Comfort Inn airport west. The shuttle bus service was more frequent than this time.

review.title: Nice, comfy and quiet
review.reviewText: It was a very nice and quiet hotel with a close friendly staff. Very close to the airport but not on the flight path. Located in a community environment that seemed very safe.
review.positiveRemarks: The cleanliness of the entire place and friendliness of the staff.
review.locationRemarks: Nice area. Close to the airport but not on the noisy flight path.

review.title: Close to the Airport-Maybe Too Close
review.reviewText: It is a nice place, but the noise of a 747 which sound like it is landing on your roof, is a little too much.

review.title: Good for a night or two.
review.reviewText: Good value near the SFO airport. Immediate neighborhood is not charming, but there are decent shopping centers, restaurants and theaters within a mile and upscale shopping and food just a bit further away in Burlingame.
review.negativeRemarks: Immediate neighborhood is not terrible, but not nice either
review.locationRemarks: Very close to the San Francisco airport and the interstate

review.title: Nice Accommodations
review.reviewText: The Comfort Inn was perfect for us. We needed to be close to the airport for an early departure. Room was quite comfortable and clean. Staff was most accommodating. We would stay there again....and certainly recommend it to friends and family. Keep up the good work.

review.title: My San Francisco trip:)
review.reviewText:
As a female if I had not been with my husband I would not had felt comfortable in the parking garage it was a little on the dark side but it was okay, The room was very nice and roomy.
The breakfast area should have been in a bigger area maybe the area of the inside courtyard where there was more room for maybe more tables but my overall views of the hotel was good.
review.positiveRemarks: Room Size, and the fact that they changed us to a room with a tub when we asked that was nice
review.locationRemarks: Area seemed quiet.....

review.title: no title
review.reviewText:
We were treated well. The beds are lumpy and a bit soft for healthy sleeping, but we were moved to a better bed and supplied with boards under the mattresses.
Porters and door men were gracious and helpful.
The young hotel manager on duty during our stay was attentive and helpful.

review.title: Disappointing
review.reviewText: Not what I expected. As soon as I noticed the locked attic in the room I felt like I was in a motel in a slasher movie. Had a hard time sleepting.
review.locationRemarks: When booking the description they give is that it is on the beach. Not!!

review.title: Nice Place
review.reviewText: This hotel had one of the best breakfast I've had at a hotel.
review.locationRemarks: Close to the airport and the BART

review.title: Not worth it
review.reviewText: We've stayed at Comfort Inns before, but did not like the look of this one. It was rundown and in a noisy neighborhood. The room was small and outdated. We actually left and stayed in another hotel for the night, even though the room was pre-paid. It was somewhat close to SFO, but you could do better for the price.

review.title: Horrible area of town
review.reviewText: No comment. Dont want to write about our experience It got the job done but wouldn't go back
review.locationRemarks: Horrible

review.title: Oh well.
review.reviewText: It was ok but online description made the hotel appear more accessable than reallity.
review.locationRemarks: Sketchy at best.

review.title: Comfort Inn San Bruno California
review.reviewText:
We enjoyed our stay at the Comfort Inn. The rooms were great and the staff was courteous. The only problem I encountered was the parking. I realize this is most likely beyond your control. The only other negative aspect of our stay was that there were not enough bath towels in the room. I notified the desk before my arrival that there would be 3 adults but there were only enough for two.

The breakfast and fitness room were also very nice.
review.positiveRemarks: Fitness room, breakfast, and ease of access to freeways.
review.negativeRemarks: Not enough towels available in bathroom and parking.
review.locationRemarks: Easy access to freeways and airport. Quiet, clean and for the most part friendly.

review.title: S.F trip
review.reviewText: Very noisy from the street traffic, people talking, people walking in room above; television quit working after an hour.
review.locationRemarks: lower scale neighborhood

review.title: Short Stay
review.reviewText: Only there a short time. Got in late & left early.
review.locationRemarks: Close to the airport. Easy on/off freeway.

review.title: Good Stay
review.reviewText: I stayed for 3 nights with not issues. The front desk was friendly. The parking garage was nice as well.
review.negativeRemarks: Water flow / temperature of the shower

review.title: Great place to lay your head
review.reviewText: This hotel was a great value, the staff was friendly, and very helpful. The rooms are nice and clean and quite comfortable. Nothing fancy, but it was just what we needed. The only down side is you do hear the planes, but since I wear earplugs, I wasn't bothered by it. Would definitely use this hotel and location again.

review.title: Not bad
review.reviewText: Close to rail BART and Caltrain (10 -15mins walk to each) convient to airport and shuttle staff really helpful and rooms excellent, the free breakfast needs some changes on a daily basis if staying there for a few days but over all was great place to stay and reasonably priced.

review.title: Good hotel near airport
review.reviewText: Good place to spend a night near the airport.

review.title: Nice stay
review.reviewText: Our stay was good except for the poor sound proofing. Those staying next to our room kept talking and laughing through out the night till around 4pm.

review.title: good hotel, bad location
review.reviewText: this hotel is good although it looks like poor from outside

review.title: More current details
review.reviewText:
We stayed here in August of 2011 for 2 nights/3 days. Comfort Inns have always been one of our favorite places to stay for cost and amenities. The staff was very friendly and helpful! The room we reserved was exactly what we requested.

Downsides - I wish it had been mentioned that ALL parking was in an underground parking garage. We have a very large 4X4 truck that is about 7' tall and some covered parking is hard for us to get in to. We had to make sure we were back at the hotel no later than 6pm to make sure there was enough room for us to get in and park. Granted not everyone has a big truck, but love is in the details. :)

Also there are not places close (walking distance) to get something to eat. So you have to drive about 3 miles to get to a restaurant or fast food place. This combined with a lot of construction going on in the area can be very tricky navigating.

Up Side - Front desk staff is WONDERFUL! Not so much house cleaning. Not that the room wasn't clean, it was, but they took our soap and didn't replace the soap. They also didn't give us a new ice bucket bag, or coffee and the missed one trashcan to be emptied. Of course the one with left over pizza. The hotel is very close to the airport and a main street so noise could be an issue. However our room had a "white noise" machine which I thought was great. We also left the fan on because being from hot weather climate I'm used to having air move all the time. The system worked flawlessly!
review.locationRemarks:
If you're coming to see and experience San Francisco then stay in downtown area. This area is more conducive to business travelers.

Very close to airport which is great if you're flying in and out.

review.title: Fine hotel for sleeping, good value, middle of nowhere
review.reviewText: Not much in the neighborhood except an pizza shop and a busy road. However the hotel is clean and comfortable and the guy at the front desk quickly brought us a cot when we requested it. Very basic, but good.

review.title: Pick a different place
review.reviewText: Very disappointing. Needs an extreme makeover.

review.title: Very tidy property
review.reviewText: extremely convenient tothe airport

review.title: Looked better in the pictures
review.reviewText: Their website sells them very well. It was not bad, but it looked nicer in the photos. Location could not have been more convenient to the airport, though the neighborhood was not horrible, but not as nice as we expected. The room was nice. The rooms were not insulated to the noise of the airplanes, but it was very close to the airport so that would be expected. While it was not what we were expecting and hoping for, it was not a bad experience either.

review.title: convenience location
review.reviewText: this hotel its very well located..its near to BART station and near to shopping mall, target, and other stores

review.title: would use again
review.reviewText: Satisfied

review.title: Very satisfied with experience
review.reviewText: This is a great little hotel close to the SF Airport. There's a little NY Pizza joint a block away that cooked us up some food even though we arrived there shortly after their 11 p.m. closing time. It's also a short walk from a Payless car rental office that proved very convenient when we got up the next morning. The free breakfast had a lot of choices and everyone was helpful. When I checked out a woman was asking help to try to locate an item she had lost at the airport and the front desk people were doing all they could to assist her. I'd definitely recommend it.

review.title: not in a great part of town
review.reviewText: Police raids in area during the night.

review.title: Nice comfortable stay.
review.reviewText: When my family and I arrive at the hotel, there was ample parking. The hotel was neat and clean. The desk clerk "Neel" was very helpful, we arrived prior to check-in time. Neel found us a room that was ready and placed us in it. He also answered all my questions and gave me directions to Fisherman's Wharf. Breakfast was very good. My family members utilized the exercise room. My family and I will stay here again when we travel to the bay area again.

review.title: Good enough
review.reviewText: Honest price, comfortable and clean room, very close to San Francisco Airport and one block from a Payless rent a car.

review.title: Good place to stay
review.reviewText: Hotel is beside airport and easy access to the high way. Room is big and clean. If pool and bar are not an necessity in your choice of hotel, it's a good place for budget travel.

review.title: Comfortable hotel!
review.reviewText: The room was very clean, comfortable and we had no complaints. The free waffles and coffee in the morning was a huge plus as well.

review.title: EASY ACCESS TO SF AND SFO
review.reviewText: flying in late? this is the place to crash quick. morning commute into SF on weekends just 15min.

review.title: will return next year
review.reviewText: close to airport, restaurants and shopping close-by, helpful front desk staff, clean rooms.

review.title: Close to the airport but still good...
review.reviewText: Aside from the noise from the jets taking off it was one of the better hotels we've found in the Bay Area. Not a bad drive into the city and there's alot of stuff locally to occupy your time.

review.title: Convenient to airport, freeways
review.reviewText: Very small, but offers covered parking and a simple yet satisfying breakfast bar. Good service and clean/nice accomodations. Very short trip to airport, highways. Note: I was able to hear jets taking off and landing during the evening, but never heard them after 10pm, I'm guessing that there were no more flights that late.

review.title: Nice family hotel
review.reviewText: We stayed at this hotel while vacationing in SF. We stayed here mainly cuz all the hotels downtown & by Fisherman's Wharf were too expensive. This hotel was nicely priced, & we were very impressed by the hotel staff and the room cleanliness. The hotel staff was eager to please - always had good directions, and suggestions on where to go. The room was nice & clean, cleaned every day we were there. This hotel is about 1/2hr drive to Fisherman's Wharf. Fisherman's Wharf is the place to be in SF. The traffic is awful at Fisherman's Whart & on the way. However, the traffic and city life around this hotel is much less fast-pace. Nice family hotel! Would highly recommend!

review.title: Not quite what I expected
review.reviewText: Although we had an extremely cheap rate thru Expedia, I would not stay here again. I'm not someone who cares much about ambiance, but the lobby in this place felt like something that should be rented by the hour. The neighborhood is not good which generally should not matter except that the parking lot is so small that it occasionally fills up and you end up having to park on the street. That happened with me and I spent about 15 minutes trying to find a well-lit area to park. I also saw two young men being arrested in the hotel parking lot, although I don't believe they were hotel guests. It appeared to be a traffic stop, but considering the neighborhood it was not surprising. Breakfast was also below par, and I have had the exact same breakfast at another Comfort Inn but thought it was much better. There are many other chain hotel options in the area, and I would definitely stay out by the airport if I were going to SF again. Hotels are cheaper and parking is free. We used our rental car quite a bit and really enjoyed vsiting Napa Valley, Sausalito, and Carmel about 2.5 hours south. If you drive into the city bring lots of change, you only get 6 minutes per quarter. There is another Comfort Inn only about 1-2 miles away, I believe listed as South SF, that looked much nicer. We went there by accident our first night. On a positive note, the room was fine except for shower pressure which was very weak.

review.title: Would go back
review.reviewText: would stay again if ever in San Francisco area

review.title: Best Hotel Stay
review.reviewText: We stayed at Comfort Inn and Suites, San Bruno for the SFO 4 Nights Vacation and I have all but only good things to say about our stay. First thing is it is right next to the SFO Air Port ( like 5 - 10 minute drive) , we arrived late by 11:30 PM or so in the night , had a slight problem identifying the route , once we got the GPS out it was piece of cake and the front desk was very friendly even at that odd time. They provide free breakfast which is though nothing special it was a wonderful way to start your busy event packed day (cereals, muffins, eggs, orange juice, and coffee/tea). The SFO downtown is close to 20 Miles but it was not an issue for us, one can get to the US 101 in couple of minutes and it is a straight drive from that point. Not much traffic (though there were stop and go periods). As far as the Condition and maintenance including room service it was great. I saw few reviews saying the noise from planes from near by Airport is sometimes too much, but believe me I did not hear any in our first floor ( may be two tired from all the day trips!) (BTW our room was facing the road...). Also I read that the area was not that great, but again I did not feel a thing. Ok with all the positives I need to add a negative, yes its the GAS Price in and around San Bruno...its costlier than SFO downtown! Enough said! Overall a wonderful, unforgettable stay and I highly recommend this place for a SFO trip.

review.title: Comfortable and clean
review.reviewText: Staff was helpful and courteous. Rooms were some of the nicer ones we've used. Surprisingly, the jet fly-overs from nearby San Francisco airport was less bothersome than we had anticipated.

review.title: Very Good For the Price
review.reviewText: Very clean hotel & also ver comfortable

review.title: Quite Surprised
review.reviewText: Easy access to the freeway and airport, even the rental car location was down the street. The breakfast at the hotel was very good. We were able to make our own waffles. I normally don't eat cereal, but did there and it was so good. The breakfast area was small, but manageable.

review.title: Close to Airport
review.reviewText: This is a nice comfortable hotel, very close to the San Francisco Airport. The room was quiet, the staff very friendly and the covered parking is a bonus. The hotel is a little off the beaten path but overall was a nice place to stay for a week.

review.title: Good Place to Stay At
review.reviewText: We were pleased with our stay at this hotel. It's a good location (close to stores, restaurants, mall). The front desk employee was very helpful upon our arrival. What was great about it was they offer complimentary breakfast and parking was convenient. The only thing I wasn't happy about was our refrigerator didn't work. Other than that, it was very clean and I wouldn't mind staying here again.

review.title: Hard to find!
review.reviewText: Because I was first in America, I'm not good at finding address. However there's no place which have address of 611 San Bruno. It was awful first day in U.S.A.

review.title: Close to airport
review.reviewText: This hotel is great if you need a place to sleep when arriving or catching a flight at SFO... It is really close and easy to find if you are driving. The staff is friendly.

review.title: SFO Hotel
review.reviewText: This is a nice hotel very close to the SFO airport. Free Parking and restuarants close by, but you would need a car.

review.title: Value for money
review.reviewText: Hotel is very convenient for SFO airport. Older style hotel, but clean, comfortable and pleasant staff. Great value for an overnight spot

review.title: Helpful Staff
review.reviewText: It was a great room for the price; the free internet worked without any hitches, and the guy behind the front desk offered to let me come back there and print my boarding pass from his computer. My room was quiet and I liked the make-your-own waffles at the continental breakfast. The front desk staff set this hotel apart; I had to cancel and reschedule a shuttle and the guy managed it for me with no hassles.

review.title: Would probably choose somewhere else
review.reviewText: It wasn't bad - overall it was fairly clean and a decent sized room. But the carpet around the threshold of the bathroom was torn and coming apart and a part of the wallpaper in the bathroom was sticking out. Details. The price was okay, though. We didn't check out the continental breakfast. Oh - and the mattress pad wasn't tight enough so that it bunched up under me every time I rolled over. Made for a rough night's sleep.

review.title: Just OK
review.reviewText: Its a typical hotel room. Nothing special, but clean and well kept. Continental breakfast was good. Parking easily accesible. I would stay there again if in the area.

review.title: Functional and close to the Airport
review.reviewText: If you arrive on a late flight and don't want to drive far for your first nights accomodation this hotel will fit the bill. No frills but clean and tidy. Watch out for the directions, you have to make a left turn very sudenly after leaving the airport.

review.title: Good for a quick stay
review.reviewText: I needed a hotel close to the airport and reasonably priced. This fit the bill. Its not the greatest neighborhood, but what is by an airport? Clean large rooms, good for a traveling family.

review.title: No frills but good value
review.reviewText: This hotel is very convenient to San Francisco Airport. It is a no frills facility but it was clean and comfortable. It was good value for the very reasonable price.
